name: OR_IMP_FRACTURE_SCAPULA
description: This table stores information about fractures of the scapula relating to shoulder implants.

columns.name: IMPLANT_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the implant record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: FRACTURE_SCAPULA_C_NAME
columns.description: The scapula fracture status category ID for the implant.
